InstructionData.Title: Gas Injector
InstructionData.Author: onebit
InstructionData.Instructions:
alias GasSensor d0 alias Pump d1
alias pressure r0 alias ratio r1 alias pp r2 define K 50 define I 0.5 alias rate r4 alias cutin r5 alias diff r6 alias temp1 r7 define PPMAX 1.25 define bias 0 alias xlasterror r8 alias xerrorx r9 alias integral r10 alias temp1 r11 alias lastintegral r12 loop: l pressure GasSensor Pressure l ratio GasSensor RatioCarbonDioxide mul pp ratio pressure sub xerrorx PPMAX pp mul temp1 xerrorx I add integral lastintegral temp1 #add diff diff rate mul rate K xerrorx add rate rate integral #mul temp1 I diff add rate rate bias #add rate rate temp1 #min rate #snltz rate move xlasterror xerrorx move lastintegral integral s db Setting lastintegral #slt rate rate 0.01 s Pump Setting rate sgtz cutin rate s Pump On cutin
yield j loop
